title: Training Camp With the Chiefs, Rams, and Vikings. Plus: Wunderkind Week. | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Checking on the Chiefs, Rams, and Vikings training camps, including the differences between building a team around Patrick Mahomes and Jared Goff (3:00). Then, what to make of an NFL that’s never been younger (26:35).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark
